text: I would like to say to people, open your eyes and find beauty where you normally don't expect it.
author: Jean Paul Gaultier

text: Art is the unceasing effort to compete with the beauty of flowers - and never succeeding.
author: Gian Carlo Menotti

text: Thankfully, beauty is easier to remove than apply, and a swipe of demaquillage in the right direction and you are you once again.
author: Margaret Cho

text: Just because you are blind and unable to see my beauty doesn't mean it does not exist.
author: Margaret Cho

text: Order is the shape upon which beauty depends.
author: Pearl S. Buck
